text: Michael John Strachan Bryce (21 June 1938 â€“ 16 January 2021) was an Australian architect and graphic and industrial designer. He was the husband of the 25th Governor-General of Australia, Dame Quentin Bryce. He was born in Brisbane, Australia. Bryce died on 16 January 2021 after a long-illness, aged 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Australian people
title: Michael Bryce
